name: Bheem 2077
description:
"A chhota bheem game but worse and open world."

"Chhota bheem" is an Indian cartoon show. A kid named Bheem is the protagonist of this show. He lives in a town named Dholakpur. Bheem is an extremely brave, strong, and intelligent young boy. He often manages to solve everyone's problems which endears him to the townspeople of Dholakpur.

This show is quite popular in India and it shaped the childhood of more than half of India's new generation. There are many games based on this show on the Play store. They are just the same concepts but with different names.

So I thought to myself "Wouldn't it be funny If there was an open world game based on chhota bheem" and that's how it all started.

Watch the Development vlogs on My youtube channel
